text: Eugeniusz Ptak (born 1 September 1960) is a retired Polish football striker.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Śląsk Wrocław players Category:Zagłębie Lubin players Category:Apollon Limassol FC players Category:Nea Salamis Famagusta FC players Category:VfB Oldenburg players Category:Miedź Legnica players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Germany
